[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ global_module=”476″ saved_tabs=”all” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Please read our terms and conditions in full before submitting entries or making payments online.

By agreeing to these Terms and Conditions you are bound by and agree to the relevant Terms and Conditions of Existem Events Ltd (PerformanceIN), the organiser of the Influencer Marketing Awards.

REFUNDS

Once an entry has been submitted it may be withdrawn as per the terms above, however, all entry fees paid are non-refundable.

For table sales or sponsorship please review your contract or contact us.

COMPANY NAME & LOGO

When submitting your entry you are also giving permission to PerformanceIN to use your company name and logo in marketing material.

Written notice must be given via events@performancein.com if you do not consent to PerformanceIN using your company name or logo.

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY DECLARATION

By submitting your entry you confirm you are the owner of all intellectual rights in your entry or have all necessary consents from all other owner (s) of intellectual rights.

PRIVACY POLICY

By submitting your entry you acknowledge you have read and agreed to our privacy policy.

Our brands and partners would like to stay in touch to let you know about events, information and opportunities, which we hope will help you in your work.  We believe we can demonstrate a legitimate interest in using your details for these messages, but if you do not wish to receive these messages, please email us to opt-out via hello@performancein.com

WINNER COLLATERAL

Please be aware that we can deliver certificates and trophies to one address only. If you do not supply an address to the Event Manager when requested after the ceremony, these will be delivered to the address given at the point of entry.

PAYMENT

Invoices for the Awards should be paid online with a debit or credit card. If preferred, payment can be made via invoice and BACS and you are able to select this option via the portal. Amex is subject to an admin fee of 2.4%. If payment is not made prior to the judging day your entry will be excluded and disqualified.

WITHDRAWING AN ENTRY

You may withdraw an entry up to 2 weeks prior to the ceremony. Any entry fees paid are non-refundable.

CHANGES

The organiser reserves the right to make changes to deadlines, pricing, and entry criteria without prior notice.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_sidebar _builder_version=”4.4.8″][/et_pb_sidebar][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
If you wish to cancel your table or seat you can do so within 15 days of confirmation of booking at no cancellation charge, otherwise, the following scale of charges shall apply to cancellation by you without cause;

  1. if the company cancels over six months prior to the event, a cancellation fee equal to 50% of the total contract shall apply or
  2. if the company cancels between three months and six months prior to the event, a cancellation fee equal to 75% of the total contract shall apply or
  3. if the company cancels within three months of the event a cancellation fee equal to 100% of total contract shall apply.

PLEASE SEND CANCELLATION REQUESTS TO: events@performancein.com
